button.interactionmanager.block_blacklis:
Manage block blacklist
Blacklisted blocks can't be broken.
button.interactionmanager.entity_blackli:
Manage entity blacklist
Blacklisted entities can't be attacked.
screen.interactionmanager.restore_defaul: Are you sure you'd like to restore default options?
confirm.interactionmanager.restore_defau:
The current options will not be saved!
Your current block blacklist won't be cleared.
option.interactionmanager.allow_shovel_c: Toggle shovels creating paths when used on dirt-like blocks
option.interactionmanager.allow_axe_stri: Toggle axes stripping blocks, such as logs
option.interactionmanager.allow_use_fire: Toggle setting off fireworks when used on blocks
option.interactionmanager.allow_attackin: Toggle the ability to attack and damage hostile mobs
Toggle the ability to attack and damage passive mobs

Toggle the ability to attack and damage villagers.
If Attack Passive Mobs is OFF this will have no effect.
Toggle the ability to attack and damage vehicles. (Boats, minecarts)
option.interactionmanager.pet_attack_mod:
All - you can attack all pets
Only Not Yours - You can attack not tamed pets and other players' pets
Not Tamed - You can only attack not tamed pets
None - You can't attack any tamable mobs
If Attack Passive Mobs is OFF this will have no effect
option.interactionmanager.allow_breaking: Toggle the ability to break blocks
option.interactionmanager.enable_block_b:
Enabled - You can't break blacklisted blocks
Disabled - You can break blacklisted blocks, unless the 'Break Blocks' option is OFF
option.interactionmanager.enable_entity_:
Enabled - You can't attack blacklisted entities
Disabled - You can attack blacklisted entities, unless
